description: Numbers with an odd number of partitions.
links: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: f[n_, k_] := Select[Range[250], Mod[PartitionsP[#], n] == k &]Table[f[2, k], {k, 0, 1}] (* _Clark Kimberling_, Jan 05 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) for(n=0, 200, if(numbpart(n)%2==1, print1(n", "))) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Nov 02 2015(Haskell)import Data.List (findIndices)a052002 n = a052002_list !! (n-1)a052002_list = findIndices odd a000041_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 03 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999
extensions: Offset corrected and b-file adjusted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 03 2015
